price: دوى به يې كشار هم نه اوري، او په هغو شيانو كې به تل تر تله اوسېدونكي وي چې زړونه يې غواړي.
arabic: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ حَسِيسَهَاۖ وَهُمۡ فِي مَا ٱشۡتَهَتۡ أَنفُسُهُمۡ خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna ḥasīsahā wahum fī mā ish'tahat anfusuhum khālidūna
